scripts.build-app: browserify -t coffeeify app/src/background.coffee -d > app/src/bundles/background.bundle.js & browserify -t coffeeify -d app/src/index.coffee > app/src/bundles/index.bundle.js
scripts.build-extension: browserify -t coffeeify extension/src/background.coffee -d > extension/src/bundles/background.bundle.js & browserify -t coffeeify -d extension/src/content.coffee > extension/src/bundles/content.bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run build-app && npm run build-extension
scripts.watch-app: watchify -t coffeeify app/src/background.coffee -o app/src/bundles/background.bundle.js -dv & watchify -t coffeeify app/src/index.coffee -o app/src/bundles/index.bundle.js -dv
scripts.watch-extension: watchify -t coffeeify extension/src/background.coffee -o extension/src/bundles/background.bundle.js -dv & watchify -t coffeeify extension/src/content.coffee -o extension/src/bundles/content.bundle.js -dv
scripts.watch: npm run watch-app & npm run watch-extension
